org.apache.spark.streaming

Class FailureSuite

  • Object
    • org.scalatest.FunSuite
      • org.apache.spark.streaming.FailureSuite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logging, TestSuiteBase

    public class FailureSuite
extends org.scalatest.FunSuite
implements TestSuiteBase, Logging
    This testsuite tests master failures at random times while the stream is running using the real clock.
